author: Curtis Ide
releaseNotes:
Version 0.9.1 Changes:
- Command ordering: Commands now appear in logical order (On, Off, Apply Pattern, Get Pattern, Refresh, Scan for Controller, Stop Scan)
- Preference ordering: Preferences reorganized with clear section separators
- Pattern verification: applyPattern() and off() now verify patterns were successfully set
- Controller discovery: Renamed "Discover Controller" to "Scan for Controller" and "Stop Discovery" to "Stop Scan"
- Subnet auto-population: Subnet to scan field auto-populates with Hubitat hub's subnet when empty
- Preference field clearing: Pattern management fields (rename, delete, new name) start empty on page load
- Switch capability: Device appears in switches list for use in rules and automations
- Command debouncing: Commands are automatically debounced with 1 second delay to prevent rapid successive commands from overwhelming the controller
- Documentation improvements: Consolidated documentation, removed duplicate information, moved technical details to code documentation
- Code organization: Protocol documentation moved to driver code header, configuration details consolidated in README
